info.name: Wikia Chat Skin: Black Metal
info.description:
Changes the chat layout for wikia chats.
For more colors, visit: https://userstyles.org/users/308785
info.additionalInfo:
To personalize which chat/s you wants it to affect, please add your desired chat link into the "Applies to (?) URL" section. Example: http://community.wikia.com/wiki/Special:Chat or http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Special:Chat and so on.

I am not really that good with coding, I apologize if there's a better way to do things.
